resources.string:
'Cook Buddy, PREVIOUS STEP' - Go to the previous step.

 'Cook Buddy, NEXT STEP' - Go to the next step.

 'Cook Buddy, CLARIFY' - Call the Recipe Author to clarify something about the recipe.

 'Cook Buddy, SET TIMER' - Sets a timer for that step.

 'Cook Buddy, GO HOME' - Return to the home screen.

 'Cook Buddy, RECIPE PAGE' - Go to first screen of current recipe.
